title: Looking for YOUR feedback for our YouTube Channel! (Scurb)
body:
Hey Guys, I'm Arkadian, one half of the YouTube Channel Scurb, and we come from little ol' New Zealand. We've been growing pretty steadily lately and have been looking for some new ideas, content, or changes to implement to our channel and was wondering what the GD thought!

I'll be poking around to answer any questions but I'd love to hear what you guys would like to see!

Channel: http://www.youtube.com/c/scurb

replies.body:
Love the channel, good laughs, puns and education.

:)
